400.title: Request is not well-formed, syntactically incorrect, or violates schema.
400.description: The request contains validation errors that the client can fix

401.title: Authentication failed due to missing Authorization header, or invalid authentication credentials.
401.description: The request lacks valid authentication credentials

403.title: Authorization failed due to insufficient permissions.
403.description: The authenticated user does not have permission to access this resource

404.title: The specified resource does not exist.
404.description: The requested resource could not be found

405.title: The server does not implement the requested HTTP method.
405.description: The HTTP method is not supported for this resource

406.title: The server does not implement the media type that would be acceptable to the client.
406.description: The server cannot produce a response matching the Accept headers

409.title: The server has detected a conflict while processing this request.
409.description: The request conflicts with the current state of the server

412.title: Update failed. Resource has changed on the server.
412.description: One or more preconditions given in the request headers evaluated to false

413.title: The request entity is larger than the size limit defined by the server.
413.description: The request payload is too large

415.title: The server does not support the request payload's media type.
415.description: The Content-Type of the request is not supported

422.title: The request cannot be processed due to factors outside of the request body. The request was well-formed, but it failed semantic validations.
422.description: The request was syntactically correct but semantically invalid

428.title: This request must be conditional and requires an If-Match header.
428.description: The origin server requires the request to be conditional

429.title: Too many requests. Blocked due to rate limiting.
429.description: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

500.title: An internal server error has occurred.
500.description: The server encountered an unexpected condition

503.title: Service Unavailable.
503.description: The server is currently unable to handle the request

504.title: Gateway Timeout.
504.description: The server did not receive a timely response from an upstream server

malformed-request-json.reason: The request JSON is not well formed.

invalid-property-length.reason: The value of a property is too short or too long.

invalid-property-value.reason: The value of the property is invalid.

read-only.reason: The property is read only, so it cannot be modified.

invalid-patch-path.reason: The value of path in a HTTP PATCH request item is invalid.

cannot-reuse-idempotency-key.reason: The idempotency key cannot be reused for a different request payload.

invalid-query-parameter.reason: A query parameter has an invalid value.

missing-query-parameter.reason: A required query parameter is missing.

invalid-path-parameter.reason: A path parameter has an invalid value.

out-of-credit.title: You do not have enough credit.

example.title: You do not have enough credit.
example.detail: Your current balance is 30, but that costs 50.

amount-mismatch.title: Should equal item_total + tax_total + shipping + handling + insurance - shipping_discount - discount.

example.title: Should equal item_total + tax_total + shipping + handling + insurance - shipping_discount - discount.
example.detail: Total amount does not match sum of components

multi-currency-order.title: Multiple differing values of currency_code are not supported.

example.title: Multiple differing values of currency_code are not supported.
example.detail: Entire Order request must have the same currency_code.

invalid-state-transition.title: The requested state transition is not allowed.

example.title: The requested state transition is not allowed.
example.detail: Cannot void a payment that is already captured. Use refund instead.

id.description: The resource id of a resource in a resource hierarchy

display_name.description: Human-readable name of an object or person

state.description: State of a resource in a finite state machine

total_items.description: Total number of items in a paginated collection

total_pages.description: Total number of pages in a paginated collection
